hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Bolero of Fire# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Damp's Hut#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.
